author: Jon Porter
title: Amazon fires two tech workers after they publicly criticized warehouse conditions
description: Amazon has fired two employees who criticized safety and working conditions at its warehouses during the COVID-19 pandemic Emily Cunningham and Maren Costa were both fired on Friday after they tweeted criticism of the company.
content:
The company said they repeatedly violated its internal policies
